title: Episode 283: Americans Don’t Trust the Media
itunes:title: Episode 283: Americans Don’t Trust the Media
description:
Recently, we talked about polls showing a serious erosion of trust in the branches of government. This week, we focus on the media. It turns out that Americans trust the media about as much as they trust Congress - and it’s amazing how little they trust Congress. Interestingly, there’s a sharp division among party lines.
